text: مَا كَانَ لِيَ مِنۡ عِلۡمِۭ بِٱلۡمَلَإِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰٓ إِذۡ يَخۡتَصِمُونَ

translation.en: I had no knowledge of the exalted assembly [of angels] when they were disputing [the creation of Adam]
translation.id: Aku tidak mempunyai pengetahuan sedikit pun tentang al-malaul a'lā (malaikat) ketika mereka berbantah-bantahan
